summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 895, for the improvement of Seattle Boulevard, from Connecticut Street to Massachusetts Street, and certain portions of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, by laying therein a water main, under Ordinance No. 10676 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
